entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:39 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 2:46 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: E 27 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
